description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 4, 2, 2; 2, 4, 1; 2, 1, 6 ].
comments: This is the digonal F lattice (the even holotype) of dimension 3.
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
formula: a(n) = coefficient of q^2n in theta3(q)*theta3(q^3)*theta3(q^5). Theta series of even sublattice of Z+sqrt(3)Z+sqrt(5)Z - Kok Seng Chua (chuaks(AT)ihpc.nus.edu.sg), May 07 2002 [corrected by _Michael Somos_, Apr 05 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
